Title: Peter Obi seeks urgent action as ‘one-chance’ killing of Abuja lawyer sparks outrage
Summary: Peter Obi seeks urgent action as ‘one-chance’ killing of Abuja-based lawyer sparks outrage . Princess Nwamaka Mediatrix Chigbo was murdered by police in Abuja . Former Labour Party presidential candidate, Peter Obi, has described the brutal killing as a stark reminder of Nigeria’s worsening insecurity

Title: CISLAC, TI Nigeria hail UK on $9.5m stolen asset recovery
Summary: Civil Society Legislative Advocacy Centre (CISLAC) and Transparency International Nigeria (TI Nigeria) hail UK on $9.5m stolen asset recovery . CISLAC, TI Nigeria hail UK for its role in recovering stolen Nigerian assets .

Title: EMV programme resumes in Kogi central after regulatory clearance
Summary: The rollout of the Electric Motor Vehicles (EMVs) under the Kogi Central Constituency Development Programme has resumed following the completion of key regulatory and structural requirements . Senator Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan has said .

Title: Insurgents’ supporters must stop now or face consequences, says defence minister
Summary: Gen. Christopher Musa (rtd) strongly warned supporters of terrorists, bandits and other criminal elements in the country to stop the dastardly act or face the full consequences of their actions . Musa gave the warning during a meeting with the Minister of Defence .

Title: Obasanjo, Atiku, Mark, others honour Tambuwal @60
Summary: Obasanjo, Atiku, David Mark, others pay glowing tributes to former Governor of Sokoto State, Senator Aminu Waziri Tambuwal, who turned 60 on Saturday . Former Senate President and National Chairman of the African Democratic Congress (ADC) David Mark pays tribute .

Title: 8 Asian countries and their common modes of public transport
Summary: Asian cities depend heavily on public transport, particularly in areas with dense populations and fast-paced lifestyles . Asian cities rely heavily on the use of public transport .

Title: Lagos–Calabar Coastal Highway already serving purpose – Umahi
Summary: Umahi said that in spite of challenges, the contractor handling the project, Hitech Construction Company Ltd., was doing well and determined to beat deadlines .

Title: AFCON 2025: Live Updates – Algeria 0-2 Nigeria
Summary: Akor Adams doubles Nigeria’s lead as he rounds Zidane and finishes into an empty net . Osimhen, who unselfishly tees up his team-mate before Adams rounds the net .

Title: Chimamanda’s son: NSA monitoring medical negligence allegations
Summary: Nigerian Society of Anaesthetists says it is monitoring allegations of medical negligence surrounding the death of Chimamanda Adichie’s 21-month-old son, Nkanu .

Title: ‘Nobody can push us out in Rivers,’ Wike tells supporters
Summary: Minister of the Federal Capital Territory, Nyesom Wike, says nobody can push him and his supporters out or derail them from supporting the reelection of President Bola Tinubu for a second term in Rivers .
